creator: jstrachman@athenium.com
text:
If you want to send a file with your HTTP Request, you're supposed to put it in
the "Filename" field of the HTTP Request (you'd think), but jmeter looks for it
in the "Parameter Name" field instead.  I haven't been able to figure out what
it does with the "Filename" field, but I don't think it sends it as the
Parameter Name.  Otherwise I could just work around it by switching the two.

creator: jstrachman@athenium.com
text: This doesn't seem to be a problem in 1.7.3, FYI.  Problem in 1.8 only.

Created attachment 4147
testing bug by using JMeter to upload file
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
